text: The quality of the service was something I had never came across in any other company. From day one they made sure I was getting the best service possible.
My family recently moved to San Francisco and one of the first things we did was call Rideau to pick a model of curtains that would go well with our new house, and as always, they delivered.
When I founded Indy Travelling Agency, I wanted to have an office that reflected my vision: relaxed, chill but realiable, and with Rideau's Skylines were just perfect for it.

In Sirma Consulting Services we give a revamp to our office every three years and since 2001 we've been partering with Rideau to give the final touches with their excellent Executive top of the line curtains.
When Rideau was just starting out over two decades ago I was one of their first customers and I immediately knew I was not going anywhere else. The quality was just out of this world.
This has been one of the most premium services I've received. They adjusted the blinds to fit exactly what I needed, a thing that no other company was offering at a reasonable price.

We decided to redesign our exterior spaces after almost a decade using an outdated set of Patio blinds. Then we switched to Rideau's Helix and we have not stopped receiving compliments from our neighborhood.
When my previous blinds provider failed to deliver to the quality standards my company and I were looking for, I discovered Rideau and have never looked back. Top of the line service!

There have been very few companies that have earned my respect the way Rideau did. They cared about every single detail of the experience from the moment I contacted them until the installation was done.
